MENUNAME_DOC: Enter the name you want to be displayed in the Volumio Browse Menu.  Note:  You are NOT changing the name of the plugin, only the Title it goes under in the Volumio Browse Menu.
ENABLE_DOC: Enable Call to reveal the Address & Call entry elements. Disable Call to remove it from the options list.  Note: Both the CALL & ACTION fields need to be filled.
CALL_DOC: Enter the address you want to call. eg. http://192.168.1.100/V  No checking can be done.  Be sure you are correct.
ACTION_DOC: Enter the label you want the action to be known by.   e.g. Volume UP.
